extension.valueString:
/**
 * By Administrative Gender of Patient Stratifier
 */
define "By Administrative Gender Stratifier":
    case 
        when Patient.gender = 'male' then "Males"
        when Patient.gender = 'female' then "Females"
        else "Other"
    end

/**
 * By Administrative Gender of Patient Stratifier
 */
define "By Geographic Region Stratifier":
    First(Patient.address A where A.use in { 'home' }).state

/*
 * Disaggregator: Geographic Region
 */
define "Geographic Region Stratifier":
	IMMZIndCom."By Geographic Region Stratifier"

/**
 * @dataElement All Doses Administered to Patient to patient ordered newest to oldest
 */
define "Doses Administered to Patient":
  [Immunization] I
    where I.status = 'completed'
    sort by date from (occurrence as FHIR.dateTime) desc

/**
 * @dataElement Japanese Encephalitis containing Doses Administered to Patient
 */
define "JE Doses Administered to Patient":
  "Doses Administered to Patient" I
  where
    I.vaccineCode in IMMZc."Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine"
JE Doses Administered to Patient During Measurement Period

/**
 * Japanese Encephalitis  Doses Administered to Patient
 */
define "JE Doses Administered to Patient During Measurement Period":
    IMMZCom."JE Doses Administered to Patient" I 
    where IMMZCom.ToDate(I.occurrence) during "Measurement Period"

/*
 * Numerator: Number of administrations of vaccines which contain Japanese encephalitis component during the reporting period.
 * Numerator Computation: COUNT immunization events WHERE administered product is a Japanese Encephalitis vaccine (IMMZ.A1.DE8) during reporting period.
 */
define "numerator":
	exists(IMMZIndCom."JE Doses Administered to Patient During Measurement Period")
Patient Under 12 Months Old During Measurement Period

/** 
 * Patient is < 12 months old at the end of the measurement period
 */
define "Patient Under 12 Months Old During Measurement Period":
    Patient.birthDate more than 12 month before end of "Measurement Period"

/** 
 * @dataElement Patient is deceased
 */
define "Patient Deceased During Measurement Period":
  case 
    when Patient.deceased is FHIR.boolean then Patient.deceased as FHIR.boolean
    when Patient.deceased is FHIR.dateTime then Patient.deceased as FHIR.dateTime before end of "Measurement Period"
    else false
  end

// TODO: Write logic here 

/*
 * Denominator: Number of immunization recommendations for Japanese encephalitis containing vaccines dur during reporting period.
 * Denominator Computation: COUNT Immunization recommendation WHERE recommended product is Japanese encephalitis (IMMZ.A1.DE8) during reporting period.
 */
define "denominator":
	IMMZIndCom."Patient Under 12 Months Old During Measurement Period"
	and not (IMMZIndCom."Patient Deceased During Measurement Period")

name: IMMZIND48
title: IMMZ.IND.48 Immunization coverage for Japanese encephalitis vaccines (Computed Denominator)
description: Compares the administered doses of Japanese encephalitis vaccines with the number of immunization recommendations for Japanese encephalitis expressed as a percentage.

population.description: Number of administrations of vaccines which contain Japanese encephalitis component during the reporting period.
Number of immunization recommendations for Japanese encephalitis containing vaccines dur during reporting period.
